rows.label: tev001311_MSG0010
rows.name:
The fiend who destroyed your homeworld
has now appeared on Mira... How awful...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001311_MSG0020
rows.name:
If there's anything I can do to help you,
you need but say the word. NLA is my
home too, now![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001311_MSG0080
rows.name:
Speak to me whenever you need me.
I'll be waiting.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001311_MSG0100
rows.name:
Rock and I both just wanted to help
in whatever way we each could...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001311_MSG0110
rows.name:
I had been assisting the crew on
escort duty, but before I knew it,
I somehow ended up here...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001311_MSG0120
rows.name:
I'll go back to the White Whale 2 and
attend to my duties there, lest I become
a burden. Please, be extremely careful...[ST:wait ]
